text: miracle noodles are a great option for people who are on a low carb diet but enjoy/crave noodles from time to time. Yes, they smell coming out of the package.  Rinse thoroughly.  They do not smell or taste funny once prepared. The texture is more like a rice noodle/cellophane noodle as opposed to wheat pasta. I prefer the angel hair pasta more than the rice, which reminds me of Israeli couscous or orzo.
